also_known_as: しまざき のぶなが
biography: Shimazaki Nobunaga was born on December 6, 1988 in Shiogama, Miyagi Prefecture, Japan. He is a voice actor (seiyuu) at Aoni Production.
name: Shimazaki Nobunaga
